pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extreme Learning Machine for Survival Analysis // First, we use the Buckley-James method to impute the data and extend the emerging extreme learning machine approach to survival analysis. Second, we present a kernel extreme learning machine Cox model regularized by an L_0-based broken adaptive ridge (BAR) penalization method. For a detailed information, see Hong Wang et al(2018) DOI: 10.1007/s10489-017-1063-4, Hong Wang and Gang Li(2019) DOI:10.1002/sim.8090.
